ValidationRule.description: Prevents creation of a new deceased case for a person who is already in a status of deceased or reported deceased
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Deceased" && ( ISPICKVAL( Person__r.FinServ__Status__c, "Deceased") || ISPICKVAL( Person__r.FinServ__Status__c, "Reported Deceased") ) && ISNEW()
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A deceased case for this person is already open
